citations.narrative:
A designated official/responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
1:16 pm on February 7, 2022. The licensees facility was not able to be inspected for compliance with the Animal Welfare
Act regulations and standards, and to ensure the welfare of the animals. A designated official/responsible adult must be
made available to accompany the inspector on an animal welfare inspection.
End Section
